frontmatter.title: Advanced Filter Parameter Logging in Rails

node.excerpt: Talk Abstract Don’t you love signing in to your favorite application only to find out it’s undergoing scheduled maintenance? I know I don’t…

frontmatter.title: From Propeller to Jet - Changing your engines mid flight
frontmatter.description: Don’t you love signing in to your favorite application only to find out it’s undergoing scheduled maintenance? In this 2018 Kafka Summit talk, I will guide you through the experience of swapping out PagerDuty’s original prop engine consisting of a Cassandra queue-based system to that of a 747 which utilizes Kafka.
